title: section 20(3) of the Official Languages (Amendment) Act 2021 (No. 49 of 2021)
heading: 1. Féadfar an tOrdú um Acht na dTeangacha Oifigiúla (Leasú), 2021
text_raw:
1. Féadfar an tOrdú um Acht na dTeangacha Oifigiúla (Leasú), 2021 

(Tosach Feidhme), 2024 a ghairm den Ordú seo.
text_norm: 1 feadfar tordu um acht na dteangacha oifigiula (leasu) 2021 (tosach feidhme) 2024 ghairm den ordu seo

title: section 20(3) of the Official Languages (Amendment) Act 2021 (No. 49 of 2021)
heading: 2. Ceaptar an 30ú lá de Mheitheamh, 2024 mar an lá a thiocfaidh na
text_raw:
2. Ceaptar an 30ú lá de Mheitheamh, 2024 mar an lá a thiocfaidh na 
forálacha seo a leanas d’Acht na dTeangacha Oifigiúla (Leasú), 2021 (Uimh. 49 
de 2021) i ngníomh: 

(a) 

alt 12; 

(b) 

alt 13; 

(c) 

alt 14; 

(d) 

alt 16. 

ARNA THABHAIRT faoi mo láimh, 
 26 Meitheamh 2024 

TOMÁS Ó BROIN 
 Aire Stáit ag an Roinn Turasóireachta, Cultúir, 
Ealaíon, Gaeltachta, Spóirt agus Meán 

Foilsíodh fógra san “Iris Oifigiúil” an 28 Meitheamh, 2024, á rá go ndearnadh 
an Ionstraim Reachtúil seo. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Official Translation / Tiontú Oifigiúil 

[320] 3 

STATUTORY INSTRUMENTS. 

S.I. No. 320 of 2024 

________________ 

OFFICIAL LANGUAGES (AMENDMENT) ACT 2021 
(COMMENCEMENT) ORDER 2024 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [320] 

Official Translation / Tiontú Oifigiúil 

S.I. No. 320 of 2024 

OFFICIAL LANGUAGES (AMENDMENT) ACT 2021 
(COMMENCEMENT) ORDER 2024 

I, THOMAS BYRNE, Minister of State at the Department of Tourism, Culture, 
Arts, Gaeltacht, Sport and Media, in exercise of the powers conferred on me by 
section 20(3) of the Official Languages (Amendment) Act 2021 (No. 49 of 2021) 
and the Tourism, Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, Sport and Media (Delegation of 
Ministerial Functions) Order 2024 (S.I. No. 253 of 2024), hereby order as 
follows:
text_norm: 2 ceaptar 30u la de mheitheamh 2024 mar la thiocfaidh na foralacha seo leanas acht na dteangacha oifigiula (leasu) 2021 (uimh 49 de 2021) ngniomh (a) alt 12 (b) alt 13 (c) alt 14 (d) alt 16 arna thabhairt faoi mo laimh 26 meitheamh 2024 tomas broin aire stait ag roinn turasoireachta cultuir ealaion gaeltachta spoirt agus mean foilsiodh fogra san iris oifigiuil 28 meitheamh 2024 ra go ndearnadh ionstraim reachtuil seo official translation tiontu oifigiuil 320 3 statutory instrument s.i no 320 2024 official language (amendment) act 2021 (commencement) order 2024 4 320 official translation tiontu oifigiuil s.i no 320 2024 official language (amendment) act 2021 (commencement) order 2024 thomas byrne minister state department tourism culture art gaeltacht sport medium exercise power conferred section 20(3) official language (amendment) act 2021 (no 49 2021) tourism culture art gaeltacht sport medium (delegation ministerial functions) order 2024 (s.i no 253 2024) hereby order follows

title: section 20(3) of the Official Languages (Amendment) Act 2021 (No. 49 of 2021)
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Official Languages (Amendment) Act
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Official Languages (Amendment) Act 

2021 (Commencement) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited official language (amendment) act 2021 (commencement) order 2024

title: section 20(3) of the Official Languages (Amendment) Act 2021 (No. 49 of 2021)
heading: 2. The 30th day of June 2024 is appointed as the day on which the following
text_raw:
2. The 30th day of June 2024 is appointed as the day on which the following 
provisions of the Official Languages (Amendment) Act 2021 (No. 49 of 2021) 
shall come into operation: 

(a) 

section 12; 

(b) 

section 13; 

(c) 

section 14; 

(d) 

section 16. 

GIVEN under my hand, 
 26 June 2024 

THOMAS BYRNE 
 Minister of State at the Department of Tourism, 

Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, Sport and Media 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 28th June, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [320] 5
